sec.title: Acknowledgments
sec.p: The authors extend their gratitude to the World Health Organization surveillance staff for their technical support.

sec.title: Authors contributions
sec.p: MSR, AI, SSZZ and MS conceived and designed the study. MSR, MU, MMA, MT and AD were responsible for data collection, lab testing, data analysis. MSR, MMA and OM wrote and revised the manuscript draft.
